line.text: Thus is his cheek the map of days outworn
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When beauty lived and died as flowers do now
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Before these bastard signs of fair were born
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or durst inhabit on a living brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Before the golden tresses of the dead
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The right of sepulchres were shorn away
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To live a second life on second head
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Ere beauty dead fleece made another gay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In him those holy antique hours are seen
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Without all ornament it self and true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Making no summer of another green
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Robbing no old to dress his beauty new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And him as for a map doth Nature store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To show false Art what beauty was of yore
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
